title: Contemporary Diamond Mangalsutra - Nalla Pusala Dandalu
materials: Base metal alloy with rose gold polish
features: Delicate chain interspersed with traditional black onyx beads. Features a central, round pendant paved with sparkling cubic zirconia stones. Modern take on the traditional mangalsutra, offering a lighter, everyday wear option.
description: A modern interpretation of the sacred Mangalsutra, this piece beautifully blends tradition and contemporary style. The dazzling cubic zirconia pendant adds a touch of elegance while maintaining the cultural significance of the Nalla Pusalu (black beads). Crafted with high-quality materials for lasting beauty and comfortable wear. Perfect for the modern woman who values tradition.
